Text:
Urk.

Horrible quality, it looks like someone held a VHS camcorder in front of a 20 year old television.

Shame, cause it's probably a good movie, but this isn't watchable.

The quality is pretty bad, maybe 3/10 V, 4/10 A.

It looks like someone recorded it by placing a VHS camcorder infront of a television.
